name: Final Shmup Mission
description:
Controls

Use the Arrow keys to move

X to Shoot  Z/C to Bomb

Scoring

Every fifth enemy drops a medal

Collecting a Medal increases the value of the next one, up to 500 Points

If a Medal falls of the screen, the value resets back to 100 Points

Get 40000 Points to get an extra life

Info

Made for the LazyDevs Basic Shmup Showcase Jam.
